cause.description:
Let's save the earth is a mission where everyone, race or social level does not matter, helps us contributing ideas to save the place where we live: The Planet Earth
We have to remember that the Earth is the only place in the whole universe where we can live.
Please, listen: We must stop making to suffer to the planet earth! We will be the affected ones!
Put your sand granite and help to make this mission achieved!!
1. the rests of garbage should be eliminated!
2. We must sow more trees!
3. the smoke of industries and cars they must be limited!
cause.name: Let's save the Earth!!
